body:
• Home
  • About Us
  • The Formula
  • For Athletes
  • Contact

Unleash Your Inner Power

Introducing the ultimate energy drink for champions.

The Boost Formula

Our unique blend gives you the energy and focus you need to exceed your limits.

  • Enhanced endurance
  • Improved mental focus
  • Faster recovery
  • Natural ingredients

What Athletes Are Saying

"This drink has completely transformed my training sessions!"
— John Doe, Professional Runner
"I feel unstoppable with this boost formula!"
— Jane Smith, Triathlete
Privacy PolicyTerms of ServiceContact Us

Subscribe for updates:
styles: #site { font-family: "Futura", Arial, sans-serif; color: #ffffff; background-color: #121212; margin: 0; padding: 0; } h1, h2, h3 { font-family: "Impact", "Arial Black", sans-serif; color: #ffa500; } a { color: #1e90ff; text-decoration: none; } a:hover { color: #ffa500; } .container { margin: 0 auto; padding: 1rem; max-width: 1200px; } .button { background-color: #1e90ff; border: none; border-radius: 4px; color: #fff; padding: 10px 20px; text-align: center; display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; cursor: pointer; transition: background-color 0.3s ease; } .button:hover { background-color: #ffa500; } .sharp-border { border: 2px solid #ffa500; border-radius: 8px; padding: 10px; } #header { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0a0a0a, #1c1c1c); padding: 20px 0; box-shadow: 0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1); } .container { display: flex; justify-content: space-between; align-items: center; margin: 0 auto; padding: 0 20px; } .container #logo { height: 50px; } .container nav ul { display: flex; gap: 20px; list-style: none; padding: 0; margin: 0; } .container nav ul li a { color: #fff; text-decoration: none; font-family: "Futura", sans-serif; font-size: 16px; padding: 10px 15px; transition: 0.3s ease; } .container nav ul li a:hover { color: #ff4500; } #hero { display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center; height: 100vh; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #0d0d0d, #1a1a1a); text-align: center; padding: 20px; } #hero h1 { font-family: "Futura", sans-serif; font-size: 3em; color: #ffa500; margin: 0; text-transform: uppercase; } #hero h3 { font-family: "Futura", sans-serif; font-size: 1.5em; color: #1e90ff; margin: 20px 0; } #hero button { font-family: "Impact", sans-serif; font-size: 1.2em; color: #fff; background: #ffa500; border: none; padding: 15px 30px; margin-top: 30px; cursor: pointer; transition: background 0.3s, border-radius 0.3s; } #hero button:hover { background: #ff4500; border-radius: 10px; } #features { background: linear-gradient(135deg, #000428 0%, #004e92 100%); color: #fff; padding: 50px 20px; text-align: center; } #features h2 { font-family: "Impact", "Futura", sans-serif; font-size: 2.5em; color: #ffa500; margin-bottom: 30px; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: 2px; } #features p { font-size: 1.2em; margin-bottom: 20px; line-height: 1.5em; max-width: 700px; margin: auto; } #features ul { list-style: none; padding: 0; font-family: "Futura", sans-serif; } #features ul li { background: #ffa500; padding: 10px; margin: 10px 0; font-size: 1.1em; border-radius: 30px; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); } #features ul li:hover { background: #e69500; cursor: pointer; transition: background 0.3s ease-in-out; } #testimonials { padding: 40px; background: linear-gradient(135deg, #1a1a1a, #333); color: #fff; text-align: center; border-radius: 10px; box-shadow: 0 4px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2); } .testimonials h2 { font-family: "Impact", sans-serif; font-size: 2.5rem; color: #ff6700; margin-bottom: 20px; } .testimonials blockquote { font-family: "Futura", sans-serif; font-size: 1.2rem; line-height: 1.6; border-left: 4px solid #00aaff; padding-left: 15px; margin: 20px auto; width: 80%; color: #fafafa; } .testimonials footer { font-size: 1rem; color: #ff6700; margin-top: 10px; font-style: italic; } #footer { background: linear-gradient(to right, #001f3f, #ff851b); padding: 20px 0; color: #fff; text-align: center; font-family: "Futura", sans-serif; border-top: 3px solid #ff4136; } .footer-links a { color: #fff; text-decoration: none; margin: 0 15px; font-size: 0.9em; } .footer-links a:hover { text-decoration: underline; } .newsletter { margin-top: 10px; } .newsletter p { font-size: 1.1em; margin-bottom: 10px; } .newsletter form { display: inline-block; } .newsletter input[type="email"] { padding: 10px; border: none; border-radius: 5px 0 0 5px; outline: none; min-width: 200px; } .newsletter button { padding: 10px 20px; background: #ff4136; border: none; border-radius: 0 5px 5px 0; color: #fff; font-weight: bold; cursor: pointer; transition: background 0.3s ease-in-out; } .newsletter button:hover { background: #85144b; }

sections.HTML:
• Home
  • About Us
  • The Formula
  • For Athletes
  • Contact

sections.CSS: #footer{background:linear-gradient(to right, #001f3f, #FF851B);padding:20px 0;color:#fff;text-align:center;font-family:'Futura', sans-serif;border-top:3px solid #FF4136;}.footer-links a{color:#fff;text-decoration:none;margin:0 15px;font-size:0.9em;}.footer-links a:hover{text-decoration:underline;}.newsletter{margin-top:10px;}.newsletter p{font-size:1.1em;margin-bottom:10px;}.newsletter form{display:inline-block;}.newsletter input[type='email']{padding:10px;border:none;border-radius:5px 0 0 5px;outline:none;min-width:200px;}.newsletter button{padding:10px 20px;background:#FF4136;border:none;border-radius:0 5px 5px 0;color:#fff;font-weight:bold;cursor:pointer;transition:background 0.3s ease-in-out;}.newsletter button:hover{background:#85144b;}
